requesterSubtitle: Tell us how your match was. We'd love to hear more.
offererSubtitle: Tell us how helping went! We’d love to hear more.

unableToHelpRequester: Why didn't you interact with your Volunteer?

commentTitle: How did this help your business?
pressToSelectFiles: Press here to upload photos or files
confirmationRequesterCompleteModalSubtit: We hope you received the help you needed to further grow your business! We hope you continue to create your next request.
confirmationRequesterIncompleteModalSubt: We are sorry you weren't able to get help from your volunteer. We hope you will receive the help you need in your next match.

confirmationOffererIncompleteModalSubtit: Businesses still need your help. Signup for new requests.
